review.title: “Great Caring Small Business”
review.pros: Pros – They understand how hard the whole work/life balance is, and try to always make it balance. Terrific support for their employees (contract like myself, or otherwise) - the whole 'we're in this together' concept is their foundation.
review.cons: Cons – They don't want to work with large companies. This will hold them back from growth, but their reason are completely understandable.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – More coffee, less herbal tea.
